001package src.pkg_commands;
002
003import src.pkg_models.Player;
004import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
005import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
006import src.pkg_rooms.TransporterRoom;
007/**
008 * GoCommand class represents a command that allows the player to move to a different room
009 * by specifying a direction (North, South, East, West, etc.).
010 * 
011 * @author Pierre MATAR
012 */
013public class GoCommand extends Command
014{
015    
016    /**
017     * Executes the GoCommand, allowing the player to move in a specified direction.
018     * 
019     * The method checks if a second word (direction) was provided, verifies if the player 
020     * can move in the specified direction (considering locked doors, traps, etc.), and updates 
021     * the player's current room accordingly.
022     * 
023     * If the current room is a transporter room, the player will be transported to a random room.
024     * 
025     * @param pPlayer The player who issued the command.
026     * @param pGameEngine The game engine which contains the state.
027     */
028    
029    @Override
030    public void execute(final Player pPlayer, final GameEngine pGameEngine) 
031    {
032        if ( ! super.hasSecondWord() ) {
033            pGameEngine.getGui().println( "Go where?" );
034            return;
035        }
036        
037
038        String vDirection = super.getSecondWord();
039        
040        Room vPreviousRoom = pPlayer.getCurrentRoom();
041        Room vNextRoom = vPreviousRoom.getExit( vDirection );
042
043        
044        if ( vNextRoom == null )
045            pGameEngine.getGui().println( "There is no door!" );
046        else {
047            if (vPreviousRoom.isLockedDoor(vDirection) && pPlayer.getItem(vPreviousRoom.getDoorKeyItemName(vDirection)) == null) {
048                    pGameEngine.getGui().println("You don't have the " + vPreviousRoom.getDoorKeyItemName(vDirection) + " to go to the " + vDirection);
049                    return;
050            }
051            
052            pPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
053            pPlayer.addRoom(vNextRoom);
054            
055            
056            if (vPreviousRoom.isTrapDoor(vDirection)) {
057                switch (vDirection) {
058                    case "North": vNextRoom.removeDirection("South"); break;
059                    case "South": vNextRoom.removeDirection("North"); break;
060                    case "West" : vNextRoom.removeDirection("East"); break;
061                    case "East": vNextRoom.removeDirection("West");
062                }
063            }
064                if (( (TransporterRoom) vPreviousRoom).isATransporterRoom()) {
065                pPlayer.removeTopRoom();
066                Room vRandomRoom = vPreviousRoom.getExit(null);
067                pPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vRandomRoom);
068                pPlayer.addRoom(vRandomRoom);
069
070            }
071            pGameEngine.printLocationInfo();
072        }
073    }
074}
